    • Field Detail

      • TAG

        public static final java.lang.String TAG
        The Constant TAG. Used for the Android debug logger.

      • mGestureDetector

        private GestureDetector mGestureDetector
        The geturedetector for this activity, used to handle user input during the time that this activity is in focus.

      • EXTRA_SELECTED_POS

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_SELECTED_POS
        The Constant EXTRA_SELECTED_POS. This is used for intent extra passing. Designed to map to the position of the selected card from the SelectCardActivity so that when the user returns to it, the card they just tapped on is in focus.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_SELECTED_ID

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_SELECTED_ID
        The Constant EXTRA_SELECTED_ID. This is used for intent extra passing. This maps to the String UUID of the card so that each activity my access it from the DB directly
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_REQUESTED_NARRATION

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_REQUESTED_NARRATION
        The Constant EXTRA_REQUESTED_NARRATION. Used to retrieve a narration request from the menu intent.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_NARR

        public static final boolean DEFAULT_NARR
        The Constant DEFAULT_NARR. Supplies the default narration setting to retrieve from the intent.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_LAST_TEXT_POS

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_LAST_TEXT_POS
        The Constant EXTRA_LAST_TEXT_POS. Used to alert the narrator what section to narrate.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_TEXT_POS

        public static final int DEFAULT_TEXT_POS
        The Constant DEFAULT_TEXT_POS. The default value to retreive for the narrator - -1 is an error so nothing will be played.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • KEY_SWIPE_DOWN

        private static final int KEY_SWIPE_DOWN
        The Constant KEY_SWIPE_DOWN. Used to handle the backwards compatibility for the swipe down action used to dismiss views in glass.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_POS

        private static final int DEFAULT_POS
        The Constant DEFAULT_POS. Used if the position of the card in the selectcardactivity cannot be obtained from the intent.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • app

        private TellMeMoreApplication app
        Reference to the parent application, which contains the database with the card information.

      • cardPos

        private int cardPos
        The position of the card within the cardscroll view from which the user launched this textviewer activity.

      • cardId

        private java.lang.String cardId
        The UUID of the audio card which is serving as the source for this textviewer activity.

      • act_context

        private Context act_context
        The Context in which this activity is running in. Used for accessing system resources.

      • mAudioManager

        private AudioManager mAudioManager
        The audio manager used to provide audio feedback to the user in response to user actions.

      • mSpeech

        private TextToSpeech mSpeech
        The narrator object used to narrate the text in this activity.

      • lastPos

        private int lastPos
        The last pos selected before the user launched a menu. Designed to provide a way to do 'selective narration' of only segments of all the text.

      • thisCard

        private TextCard thisCard
        A reference to the text card containing all the information used in this activity.

      • mView

        private LinearLayout mView
        The main view for this layout. This will contain all the textviews as children as they are added from the card.

      • scroller

        private HeadScrollView scroller
        The headscrollview allowing the user to scroll up and down the list of text.
